actions.text: Amendment SA 4234 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 54. Record Vote Number: 172.

Amendment SA 4234 proposed by Senator Santorum. (consideration: CR S5847-5850) To authorize, with an offset, assistance for prodemocracy programs and activities inside and outside Iran, to make clear that the United States supports the ability of the people of Iran to exercise self-determination over their form of government, and to make enhancements to the Iran-Libya Sanctions Act of 1996.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 4234 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 54. Record Vote Number: 172.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4234 proposed by Senator Santorum.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 4234 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 54. Record Vote Number: 172.

purpose: To authorize, with an offset, assistance for prodemocracy programs and activities inside and outside Iran, to make clear that the United States supports the ability of the people of Iran to exercise self-determination over their form of government, and to make enhancements to the Iran-Libya Sanctions Act of 1996.
